thread.title: Man armed and barricaded in Lethbridge
thread.title_full: Man armed and barricaded in Lethbridge

author: David Boushy
title: Man armed and barricaded in Lethbridge
text:
February 10, 2017 6:02 pm Updated: February 10, 2017 6:17 pm Man armed and barricaded in Lethbridge By David Boushy Reporter Global News 
Lethbridge police What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
Lethbridge police are currently dealing with an armed man who has barricaded himself in a home on Dalhousie Court W. 
Police said he’s contained to the residence and is communicating with them. 
People in the immediate area are advised to avoid the area and take shelter in their own homes until the situation is resolved. Police on scene along Dalhousie Crt in response to armed/barricaded subject. Neighbours advised to stay in homes/public avoid area #yql 
— Lethbridge Police (@lethpolice) February 10, 2017 
The incident began around 3:00 p.m. Friday afternoon. 
More to come..
